definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: All last night the wind howled like a stray dog, and the rain still pours on without a break.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚，風如喪家之犬般咆哮了一夜，雨也下個不停。

sentences.english: They are like a begging of the dog.
sentences.chinese: 他們就象一隻搖尾乞憐的喪家之犬。
